summary: Sach is the exact double of a famous French scientist who has invented a powerful rocket fuel. Enemy agents, mistaking Sach for the scientist, attempt to kidnap him and get the formula for the fuel.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Bernard Gorcey|Veola Vonn|Steven Geray|John Wengraf|Mari Lynn|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Gordon B. Clarke|Alphonse Martell|Fritz Feld|Gertrude Astor|Paul Bradley|George Bruggeman|Jack Chefe|Beulah Christian|James Conaty|Bess Flowers|Joe Gilbert|Roy Gordon|Robin Hughes|Charles La Torre|Murray Pollack|Cosmo Sardo|Sally Yarnell|Estelita Zarco
title: Paris Playboys
